description:
In a celebration of innovation and preserving computing history, Microsoft has released the source code for MS-DOS 4.00 in partnership with IBM. The release – available under the permissive MIT license – includes the operating system’s source code, binary files, and original documentation. The decision to open source MS-DOS 4.00 stems from recent correspondence between... Read more »

The post Microsoft and IBM release MS-DOS 4.00 source code appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Microsoft and IBM release MS-DOS 4.00 source code
